class.name: SwitchingEigenDecomposition

javadoc.text: Checks to see what type of matrix is being decomposed and calls different eigenvalue decomposition * algorithms depending on the results. This primarily checks to see if the matrix is symmetric or not.
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

javadoc.param: tol Tolerance for a matrix being symmetric

method.name: inputModified
method.comment: since it doesn't know which algorithm will be used until a matrix is provided make a copy

tolerance used in deciding if a matrix is symmetric or not
should it compute eigenvectors or just eigenvalues?
